Title: Twist and Shout
Writer: Caitlin Meares, Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Arielle Carver-O'Neill
Plot: Ruby's latest creation is her most diabolical plan yet to turn Brandy against Ash; Pablo suspects something isn't right with Kelly when she meets him and Ash at the school; chaos ensues when evil shows up at the dance.
